awards.text: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: Hysterical panic has engulfed the world after the United States and the Soviet Union simultaneously detonate nuclear devices causing a change to the nutation (axis of rotation) of the Earth.
plot: When the USA and Russia unwittingly test atomic bombs at the same time, it alters the nutation (axis of rotation) of the Earth.
title: The Day the Earth Caught Fire
writers: Wolf Mankowitz (written for the screen by)
Val Guest (written for the screen by)
